Simulation¶

The simulation module¶

This module provides classes organizing entire simulation, including visualization and saving graphics.

class biosim.simulation.BioSim(island_map, initial_population, seed, ymax_animals=None, cmax_animals=None, img_base=None, img_fmt='png')[source]¶

Class for simulating the model of an ecosystem.

Parameters:
  • island_map – Multi-line string specifying island geography
  • ini_pop – List of dictionaries specifying initial population
  • seed – Integer used as random number seed
  • ymax_animals – Number specifying y-axis limit for graph showing animal numbers
  • cmax_animals – Dict specifying color-code limits for animal densities
  • img_base – String with beginning of file name for figures, including path
  • img_fmt – String with file type for figures, e.g. ‘png’

If ymax_animals is None, the y-axis limit should be adjusted automatically.

If cmax_animals is None, sensible, fixed default values should be used. cmax_animals is a dict mapping species names to numbers, e.g.,

{‘Herbivore’: 50, ‘Carnivore’: 20}

If img_base is None, no figures are written to file. Filenames are formed as

‘{}_{:05d}.{}’.format(img_base, img_no, img_fmt)

where img_no are consecutive image numbers starting from 0. img_base should contain a path and beginning of a file name.

add_population(population)[source]¶

Add a population to the island during simulation.

Parameters:population – List of dictionaries specifying population
animal_distribution¶

Pandas DataFrame with animal count per species for each cell on island.

create_array_carns()[source]¶

Creates arrays used to create heat map of carnivore population.

create_array_herbs()[source]¶

Creates array used to create heat map of herbivore population.

create_map_graphics()[source]¶

Creates graphic of the map of the island’s geography.

make_movie(movie_fmt='mp4')[source]¶

Creates MPEG4 movie from visualization images saved.

Parameters:movie_fmt – str format for movie (default=’mp4’)
Note:Requires ffmpeg

The movie is stored as img_base + movie_fmt.

Raises:
  • RuntimeError – if img_base not defined or ffmpeg fails
  • ValueError – if movie format is unknown
num_animals¶

Total number of animals on island.

num_animals_per_species¶

Number of animals per species in island, as dictionary.

static reset_params()[source]¶

Resets parameters of all classes.

save_graphics()[source]¶

Saves graphics to file, if file name is given.

static set_animal_parameters(species, params)[source]¶

Set parameters for animal species. All animal parameters shall be positive. However, DeltaPhiMax and F shall be strictly positive and eta shall lie between zero and one.

Parameters:
  • species – String, name of animal species
  • params – Dict with valid parameter specification for species
Raises:

ValueError – if parameter has invalid value or name
static set_landscape_parameters(landscape, params)[source]¶

Set parameters for landscape type. f_max must be positive.

Parameters:
  • landscape – String, code letter for landscape
  • params – Dict with valid parameter specification for landscape
Raises:

ValueError – if parameter name or value is invalid
setup_graphics()[source]¶

Creates subplots.

simulate(num_years, vis_years=1, img_years=None)[source]¶

Run simulation while visualizing the result.

Parameters:
  • num_years – number of years to simulate
  • vis_years – years between visualization updates
  • img_years – years between visualizations saved to files

(default: vis_years)

Image files will be numbered consecutively.

update_graphics()[source]¶

Updates all graphics with current data and title.

update_heat_map_carns()[source]¶

Update visualization of heat map for carnivores.

update_heat_map_herbs()[source]¶

Update visualization of heat map for herbivores.

update_line_graph()[source]¶

Updates line graph for both species.

year¶

Last year simulated.
